queries.item: CREATE TABLE `?:eldico_bridge_products` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `eldc_product_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `eldc_code` varchar(55) DEFAULT NULL, `eldc_barcode` varchar(55) DEFAULT NULL, `eldc_product_title` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `eldc_product_description` text DEFAULT NULL, `eldc_small_description` text DEFAULT NULL, `eldc_large_description` text DEFAULT NULL, `eldc_product_image` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `eldc_product_extra_image` text DEFAULT NULL, `eldc_manufacturer` varchar(55) DEFAULT NULL, `eldc_category_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `eldc_category` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `eldc_wholesale_price` decimal(12,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, `eldc_discount_category` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `eldc_retail_price` decimal(12,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, `eldc_price_change` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `eldc_premium_product` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `eldc_recycle` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `eldc_availability` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `eldc_athens` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `eldc_thessaloniki` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `eldc_expected` int(11) NOT NULL, `eldc_warranty` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `eldc_country` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `eldc_box_weight` decimal(12,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, `eldc_box_volume` decimal(12,7) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.0000000, `eldc_packaging_info` tinyint(4) NOT NULL, `eldc_product_dimensions` varchar(55) NOT NULL, `eldc_product_weight` varchar(55) NOT NULL, `eldc_product_volume` varchar(55) NOT NULL, `eldc_specifications` tinyint(4) NOT NULL, `eldc_additional_infos` tinyint(4) NOT NULL, `eldc_parent_code` varchar(55) NOT NULL, `eldc_vat` int(11) NOT NULL, `eldc_warn_gr` text DEFAULT NULL, `eldc_warn_en` text DEFAULT NULL, `eldc_distributor` tinytext DEFAULT NULL, `eldc_minimum_quantity` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, `eldc_increment_quantity` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, `eldc_flag` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `eldc_date_created` varchar(55) NOT NULL, `eldc_date_updated` varchar(55) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`eldc_product_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:eldico_bridge_features_variants` (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `eldc_feature_id` INT NOT NULL , `eldc_id` INT NOT NULL , `eldc_product_id` INT NOT NULL , `eldc_feature_variant` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci;
